hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #Saria's Song#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #2# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Farore's Wind#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Left Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Bridge

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
